KillerBunny - No-one seems to be able to download the complete file.  I understand you wanting to defend yourself, but your best defence is to seed the file to completetion so at least one of us can confirm it's genuine.  

I know you've been sick, but it's been nearly 3 weeks and we can still only get 27.3% of the file.

There does seem to be anywhere up to 5 seeds at a time, with the ip suffix 'available.above.net', but no-one can connect to them.  They are constantly seeding complete copies amongst themselves, but everyone else is stuck at 27.3%
